name: Seal The Deal
description:
Seals shoot a penguin and use it as a football. Control is in a gameplay screenshot.

Use controller: Move on the left thingy and change weapon at (x,y,b) and shoot at A

The game was a part of Create Jam Spring 2016.

Keyboard Controls:

P1: move up W move down S shoot X (change weapon 1,2,3)

P2: move up Y move down H shoot N (change weapon 8,9,0)
